summary: WHILE DRIVING AT 5 MPH AND TURNING INTO A PARKING AREA,  WHEEL AND TIRE FELL OFF.  THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO THE DEALER, AND THE MECHANIC INDICATED  THAT THE LOWER BALL JOINT BROKE.   *AK   AS A RESULT THE RIGHT AXLE HAD GONE OUT WITH IT.  THERE WAS NO WARNING.  THE TIRES WORE FINE.  HONDA WAS NEVER ABLE TO CORRECT THE PROBLEM.  THE ABS WARNING LIGHT WOULD ILLUMINATE 1/2 MILE ALONG WITH NOISE.  HONDA SUGGESTED THAT THE PROBLEM WAS FINE.   *SC
